linode.list.description: Returns a list of all Linodes user has access or delete to, including some properties.  Status values are -1: Being Created, 0: Brand New, 1: Running, and 2: Powered Off.

LinodeID.name: LinodeID
LinodeID.description: Limits the list to the specified LinodeID

Mode.name: Mode
Mode.description: The connections mode for this node.  One of 'accept', 'reject', or 'drain'

Weight.name: Weight
Weight.description: Load balancing weight, 1-255. Higher means more connections.

Address.name: Address
Address.description: The address:port combination used to communicate with this Node

lpm_displayGroup.name: lpm_displayGroup
lpm_displayGroup.description: Display group in the Domain list inside the Linode DNS Manager

master_ips.name: master_ips
master_ips.description: When type=slave, the zone's master DNS servers list, semicolon separated

axfr_ips.name: axfr_ips
axfr_ips.description: IP addresses allowed to AXFR the entire zone, semicolon separated

avail.datacenters.description: Returns a list of Linode data center facilities.

avail.linodeplans.description: Returns a structure of Linode PlanIDs containing the Plan label and the availability in each Datacenter.

PlanID.name: PlanID
PlanID.description: Limits the list to the specified PlanID

description.name: description
description.description: An optional description of the Image.

ImageID.name: ImageID
ImageID.description: The ID of the Image to modify.

linode.webconsoletoken.description: Generates a console token starting a web console LISH session for the requesting IP

ClientConnThrottle.name: ClientConnThrottle
ClientConnThrottle.description: To help mitigate abuse, throttle connections per second, per client IP. 0 to disable. Max of 20.

DatacenterID.name: DatacenterID
DatacenterID.description: The DatacenterID from avail.datacenters() where you wish to place this new NodeBalancer

linode.ip.addpublic.description: Assigns a Public IP to a Linode.  Returns the IPAddressID and IPAddress that was added.

LinodeID.name: LinodeID
LinodeID.description: The LinodeID of the Linode that will be assigned an additional public IP address

lpm_displayGroup.name: lpm_displayGroup
lpm_displayGroup.description: Display group in the Domain list inside the Linode DNS Manager

master_ips.name: master_ips
master_ips.description: When type=slave, the zone's master DNS servers list, semicolon separated

axfr_ips.name: axfr_ips
axfr_ips.description: IP addresses allowed to AXFR the entire zone, semicolon separated

account.estimateinvoice.description: Estimates the invoice for adding a new Linode or NodeBalancer as well as resizing a Linode. This returns two fields: PRICE which is the estimated cost of the invoice, and INVOICE_TO which is the date invoice would be though with timezone set to America/New_York

PaymentTerm.name: PaymentTerm
PaymentTerm.description: Subscription term in months. One of: 1, 12, or 24. This is required for modes 'linode_new' and 'nodebalancer_new'.

mode.name: mode
mode.description: This is one of the following options: 'linode_new', 'linode_resize', or 'nodebalancer_new'.

LinodeID.name: LinodeID
LinodeID.description: This is the LinodeID you want to resize and is required for mode 'linode_resize'.

PlanID.name: PlanID
PlanID.description: The desired PlanID available from avail.LinodePlans(). This is required for modes 'linode_new' and 'linode_resize'.

isPublic.name: isPublic
isPublic.description: Whether this StackScript is published in the Library, for everyone to use

DistributionIDList.name: DistributionIDList
DistributionIDList.description: Comma delimited list of DistributionIDs that this script works on

Label.name: Label
Label.description: The display label for this Disk

isReadOnly.name: isReadOnly
isReadOnly.description: Enable forced read-only for this Disk

linode.disk.imagize.description: Creates a gold-master image for future deployments

Label.name: Label
Label.description: Sets the name of the image shown in the base image list, defaults to the source image label

LinodeID.name: LinodeID
LinodeID.description: Specifies the source Linode to create the image from

Description.name: Description
Description.description: An optional description of the created image

DiskID.name: DiskID
DiskID.description: Specifies the source Disk to create the image from

professionalservices.scope.create.description: Creates a new Professional Services scope submission

linode_plan.name: linode_plan
linode_plan.description: Which Linode plans would you like to deploy?

web_server.name: web_server
web_server.description: These provide network protocol handling for hosting websites.

mail_transfer.name: mail_transfer
mail_transfer.description: Mail transfer agents facilitate message transfer between servers

server_quantity.name: server_quantity
server_quantity.description: How many separate servers are involved in this migration?

provider_access.name: provider_access
provider_access.description: What types of server access do you have at your current provider?

monitoring.name: monitoring
monitoring.description: Constant monitoring of your deployed systems--these can also provide automatic notifications for service failures.

web_cache.name: web_cache
web_cache.description: Caching mechanisms provide temporary storage for web requests--cached content can generally be retrieved faster.

database_server.name: database_server
database_server.description: Generally used by applications to provide an organized way to capture and manipulate data

mail_filtering.name: mail_filtering
mail_filtering.description: Services here manipulate recieved messages in various ways

content_management.name: content_management
content_management.description: Centralized interfaces for editing, organizing, and publishing content

linode_datacenter.name: linode_datacenter
linode_datacenter.description: Which datacenters would you like your Linodes to be deployed in?

mail_retrieval.name: mail_retrieval
mail_retrieval.description: User mail clients connect to these to retrieve delivered mail

system_administration.name: system_administration
system_administration.description: Various web interfaces for performing system administration tasks

crossover.name: crossover
crossover.description: These can assist in providing reliable crossover--failures of individual components can be transparent to the application.

application_quantity.name: application_quantity
application_quantity.description: How many separate applications or websites are involved in this migration?

webmail.name: webmail
webmail.description: Access and administrate mail via web interfaces

replication.name: replication
replication.description: Redundant services often have shared state--replication automatically propagates state changes between individual components.

linode.disk.createfromimage.description: Creates a new disk from a previously imagized disk.

Label.name: Label
Label.description: The label of this new disk image

rootSSHKey.name: rootSSHKey
rootSSHKey.description: Optionally sets this string into /root/.ssh/authorized_keys upon image deployment

size.name: size
size.description: The size of the disk image to creates. Defaults to the minimum size required for the requested image

LinodeID.name: LinodeID
LinodeID.description: Specifies the Linode to deploy on to

rootPass.name: rootPass
rootPass.description: Optionally sets the root password at deployment time. If a password is not provided the existing root password of the frozen image will not be modified

ImageID.name: ImageID
ImageID.description: The ID of the frozen image to deploy from

nodebalancer.delete.description: Immediately removes a NodeBalancer from your account and issues a pro-rated credit back to your account, if applicable.

linode.create.description: Creates a Linode and assigns you full privileges. There is a 75-linodes-per-hour limiter.

PlanID.name: PlanID
PlanID.description: The desired PlanID available from avail.LinodePlans()

DatacenterID.name: DatacenterID
DatacenterID.description: The DatacenterID from avail.datacenters() where you wish to place this new Linode

PaymentTerm.name: PaymentTerm
PaymentTerm.description: Subscription term in months for prepaid customers.  One of: 1, 12, or 24

isReadOnly.name: isReadOnly
isReadOnly.description: Enable forced read-only for this Disk

Label.name: Label
Label.description: The display label for this Disk

Size.name: Size
Size.description: The size in MB of this Disk.

Type.name: Type
Type.description: The formatted type of this disk.  Valid types are: ext3, ext4, swap, raw

StackScriptUDFResponses.name: StackScriptUDFResponses
StackScriptUDFResponses.description: JSON encoded name/value pairs, answering this StackScript's User Defined Fields

DistributionID.name: DistributionID
DistributionID.description: Which Distribution to apply this StackScript to.  Must be one from the script's DistributionIDList

rootSSHKey.name: rootSSHKey
rootSSHKey.description: Optionally sets this string into /root/.ssh/authorized_keys upon distribution configuration.

Label.name: Label
Label.description: The label of this new disk image

Size.name: Size
Size.description: Size of this disk image in MB

StackScriptID.name: StackScriptID
StackScriptID.description: The StackScript to create this image from

linode.ip.setrdns.description: Sets the rDNS name of a Public IP.  Returns the IPAddressID and IPAddress that were updated.

IPAddressID.name: IPAddressID
IPAddressID.description: The IPAddressID of the address to update

Hostname.name: Hostname
Hostname.description: The hostname to set the reverse DNS to

Alert_cpu_enabled.name: Alert_cpu_enabled
Alert_cpu_enabled.description: Enable the cpu usage email alert

Alert_bwin_enabled.name: Alert_bwin_enabled
Alert_bwin_enabled.description: Enable the incoming bandwidth email alert

Alert_bwquota_enabled.name: Alert_bwquota_enabled
Alert_bwquota_enabled.description: Enable the bw quote email alert

Alert_diskio_enabled.name: Alert_diskio_enabled
Alert_diskio_enabled.description: Enable the disk IO email alert

lpm_displayGroup.name: lpm_displayGroup
lpm_displayGroup.description: Display group in the Linode list inside the Linode Manager

Alert_bwout_enabled.name: Alert_bwout_enabled
Alert_bwout_enabled.description: Enable the outgoing bandwidth email alert

check_path.name: check_path
check_path.description: When check=http, the path to request

check_body.name: check_body
check_body.description: When check=http, a regex to match within the first 16,384 bytes of the response body

cipher_suite.name: cipher_suite
cipher_suite.description: SSL cipher suite to enforce. One of 'recommended', 'legacy'

check_attempts.name: check_attempts
check_attempts.description: Number of failed probes before taking a node out of rotation. 1-30

Port.name: Port
Port.description: Port to bind to on the public interfaces. 1-65534

check.name: check
check.description: Perform active health checks on the backend nodes.  One of 'connection', 'http', 'http_body'

check_passive.name: check_passive
check_passive.description: Enable passive checks based on observing communication with back-end nodes.

ssl_key.name: ssl_key
ssl_key.description: Unpassphrased private key for the SSL certificate when protocol is 'https'

check_timeout.name: check_timeout
check_timeout.description: Seconds to wait before considering the probe a failure. 1-30.  Must be less than check_interval.

ssl_cert.name: ssl_cert
ssl_cert.description: SSL certificate served by the NodeBalancer when the protocol is 'https'

linode.ip.list.description: Returns the IP addresses of all Linodes you have access to.

IPAddressID.name: IPAddressID
IPAddressID.description: If specified, limits the result to this IPAddressID

LinodeID.name: LinodeID
LinodeID.description: If specified, limits the result to this LinodeID

avail.stackscripts.description: Returns a list of available public StackScripts.

DistributionID.name: DistributionID
DistributionID.description: Limit the results to StackScripts that can be applied to this DistributionID

api.spec.description:
Returns a data structure of the entire Linode API specification. This method does not require authorization.

For example: https://api.linode.com/?api_action=api.spec

ImageID.name: ImageID
ImageID.description: The ID of the gold-master image to delete

linode.disk.list.description: Status values are 1: Ready and 2: Being Deleted.

linode.clone.description: Creates a new Linode, assigns you full privileges, and then clones the specified LinodeID to the new Linode. There is a limit of 5 active clone operations per source Linode.  It is recommended that the source Linode be powered down during the clone.

PaymentTerm.name: PaymentTerm
PaymentTerm.description: Subscription term in months for prepaid customers.  One of: 1, 12, or 24

DatacenterID.name: DatacenterID
DatacenterID.description: The DatacenterID from avail.datacenters() where you wish to place this new Linode

LinodeID.name: LinodeID
LinodeID.description: The LinodeID that you want cloned

PlanID.name: PlanID
PlanID.description: The desired PlanID available from avail.LinodePlans()

user.getapikey.description: Authenticates a Linode Manager user against their username, password, and two-factor token (when enabled), and then returns a new API key, which can be used until it expires.  The number of active keys is limited to 20.  Batch requests will be rejected if they include this API action.

label.name: label
label.description: An optional label for this key.

expires.name: expires
expires.description: Number of hours the key will remain valid, between 0 and 8760. 0 means no expiration. Defaults to 168.

token.name: token
token.description: Required when two-factor authentication is enabled.

linode.delete.description: Immediately removes a Linode from your account and issues a pro-rated credit back to your account, if applicable.  To prevent accidental deletes, this requires the Linode has no Disk images.  You must first delete its disk images."

skipChecks.name: skipChecks
skipChecks.description: Skips the safety checks and will always delete the Linode

check_path.name: check_path
check_path.description: When check=http, the path to request

Port.name: Port
Port.description: Port to bind to on the public interfaces. 1-65534

check_body.name: check_body
check_body.description: When check=http, a regex to match within the first 16,384 bytes of the response body

check.name: check
check.description: Perform active health checks on the backend nodes.  One of 'connection', 'http', 'http_body'

check_passive.name: check_passive
check_passive.description: Enable passive checks based on observing communication with back-end nodes.

ssl_key.name: ssl_key
ssl_key.description: Unpassphrased private key for the SSL certificate when protocol is 'https'

cipher_suite.name: cipher_suite
cipher_suite.description: SSL cipher suite to enforce. One of 'recommended', 'legacy'

check_timeout.name: check_timeout
check_timeout.description: Seconds to wait before considering the probe a failure. 1-30.  Must be less than check_interval.

check_attempts.name: check_attempts
check_attempts.description: Number of failed probes before taking a node out of rotation. 1-30

ssl_cert.name: ssl_cert
ssl_cert.description: SSL certificate served by the NodeBalancer when the protocol is 'https'

linode.reboot.description: Issues a shutdown, and then boot job for a given LinodeID.

Label.name: Label
Label.description: The label of this new disk image

rootSSHKey.name: rootSSHKey
rootSSHKey.description: Optionally sets this string into /root/.ssh/authorized_keys upon distribution configuration.

Size.name: Size
Size.description: Size of this disk image in MB

DistributionID.name: DistributionID
DistributionID.description: The DistributionID to create this disk from.  Found in avail.distributions()

linode.resize.description: Resizes a Linode from one plan to another.  Immediately shuts the Linode down, charges/credits the account, and issue a migration to another host server.

PlanID.name: PlanID
PlanID.description: The desired PlanID available from avail.LinodePlans()

nodebalancer.node.list.description: Returns a list of Nodes associated with a NodeBalancer Config

NodeID.name: NodeID
NodeID.description: Limits the list to the specified NodeID

JobID.name: JobID
JobID.description: Limits the list to the specified JobID

domain.list.description: Lists domains you have access to.

DomainID.name: DomainID
DomainID.description: Limits the list to the specified DomainID

Name.name: Name
Name.description: The hostname or FQDN.  When Type=MX the subdomain to delegate to the Target MX server.

Target.name: Target
Target.description: When Type=MX the hostname.  When Type=CNAME the target of the alias.  When Type=TXT the value of the record. When Type=A or AAAA the token of '[remote_addr]' will be substituted with the IP address of the request.

Priority.name: Priority
Priority.description: Priority for MX and SRV records, 0-255

TTL_sec.name: TTL_sec
TTL_sec.description: TTL.  Leave as 0 to accept our default.

Protocol.name: Protocol
Protocol.description: The protocol to append to an SRV record.  Ignored on other record types.

Type.name: Type
Type.description: One of: NS, MX, A, AAAA, CNAME, TXT, or SRV

linode.ip.swap.description: Exchanges Public IP addresses between two Linodes within a Datacenter.  The destination of the IP Address can be designated by either the toLinodeID or withIPAddressID parameter.  Returns the resulting relationship of the Linode and IP Address parameters.  When performing a one directional swap, the source is represented by the first of the two resultant array members.

toLinodeID.name: toLinodeID
toLinodeID.description: The LinodeID of the Linode where IPAddressID will be transfered

IPAddressID.name: IPAddressID
IPAddressID.description: The IPAddressID of an IP Address to transfer or swap

withIPAddressID.name: withIPAddressID
withIPAddressID.description: The IP Address ID to swap

linode.boot.description: Issues a boot job for the provided ConfigID.  If no ConfigID is provided boots the last used configuration profile, or the first configuration profile if this Linode has never been booted.

ConfigID.name: ConfigID
ConfigID.description: The ConfigID to boot, available from linode.config.list().

avail.distributions.description: Returns a list of available Linux Distributions.

DistributionID.name: DistributionID
DistributionID.description: Limits the results to the specified DistributionID

linode.disk.duplicate.description: Performs a bit-for-bit copy of a disk image.

isXen.name: isXen
isXen.description: Show or hide Xen compatible kernels

isKVM.name: isKVM
isKVM.description: Show or hide KVM compatible kernels

DistributionIDList.name: DistributionIDList
DistributionIDList.description: Comma delimited list of DistributionIDs that this script works on

isPublic.name: isPublic
isPublic.description: Whether this StackScript is published in the Library, for everyone to use

ConfigID.name: ConfigID
ConfigID.description: The parent ConfigID to attach this Node to

Mode.name: Mode
Mode.description: The connections mode for this node.  One of 'accept', 'reject', or 'drain'

Weight.name: Weight
Weight.description: Load balancing weight, 1-255. Higher means more connections.

Address.name: Address
Address.description: The address:port combination used to communicate with this Node

account.info.description: Shows information about your account such as the date your account was opened as well as your network utilization for the current month in gigabytes.

linode.ip.addprivate.description: Assigns a Private IP to a Linode.  Returns the IPAddressID that was added.

size.name: size
size.description: The requested new size of this Disk in MB

linode.mutate.description: Upgrades a Linode to its next generation.

ClientConnThrottle.name: ClientConnThrottle
ClientConnThrottle.description: To help mitigate abuse, throttle connections per second, per client IP. 0 to disable. Max of 20.

nodebalancer.config.list.description: Returns a list of NodeBalancers this user has access or delete to, including their properties

ConfigID.name: ConfigID
ConfigID.description: Limits the list to the specified ConfigID

Comments.name: Comments
Comments.description: Comments you wish to save along with this profile

helper_distro.name: helper_distro
helper_distro.description: Enable the Distro filesystem helper.  Corrects fstab and inittab/upstart entries depending on the kernel you're booting.  You want this.

devtmpfs_automount.name: devtmpfs_automount
devtmpfs_automount.description: Controls if pv_ops kernels should automount devtmpfs at boot.

helper_network.name: helper_network
helper_network.description: Automatically creates network configuration files for your distro and places them into your filesystem.

DiskList.name: DiskList
DiskList.description: A comma delimited list of DiskIDs; position reflects device node.  The 9th element for specifying the initrd.

RootDeviceRO.name: RootDeviceRO
RootDeviceRO.description: Enables the 'ro' kernel flag.  Modern distros want this.

RootDeviceNum.name: RootDeviceNum
RootDeviceNum.description: Which device number (1-8) that contains the root partition.  0 to utilize RootDeviceCustom.

virt_mode.name: virt_mode
virt_mode.description: Controls the virtualization mode. One of 'paravirt', 'fullvirt'

KernelID.name: KernelID
KernelID.description: The KernelID for this profile.  Found in avail.kernels()

helper_depmod.name: helper_depmod
helper_depmod.description: Creates an empty modprobe file for the kernel you're booting.

linode.shutdown.description: Issues a shutdown job for a given LinodeID.

ImageID.name: ImageID
ImageID.description: Request information for a specific gold-master image

account.paybalance.description: Pays current balance on file, returning it in the response.

nodebalancer.node.delete.description: Deletes a Node from a NodeBalancer Config

nodebalancer.list.description: Returns a list of NodeBalancers this user has access or delete to, including their properties

NodeBalancerID.name: NodeBalancerID

test.echo.description: Echos back parameters that were passed in.
